about.title: about
about.quote1: All-round **Software Engineer** with a background in **Artificial Intelligence**. Started as professional game developer in 2007. **Games** became **mobile apps**. Over time, this evolved into building complex cross-platform **web applications**.
about.quote2: Hands-on **Software Architect** available for **full-stack**, **back-end** and **front-end** opportunities. Familiar with a wide variety of platforms and technologies. Specialised in **C# .NET** and **Angular Typescript**, but not attached to a single framework or programming language.
about.quote3: I'm a **domotics** enthousiast, **cycling** addict and father of three. Published some **open source** projects to help the community.
